blog.name: asiryn
blog.title: Not Above Them, But Part of Them...
blog.description:
~ About Asiryn ~
~ 27
~ I'm a cis woman, so you can use she/her pronouns when referring to me.
~ I'm aroace (sex-repulsed)
~ Physically disabled, suffer from constant, chronic pain and depression, and possibly un-diagnosed anxiety. 
~ I have white and cis privilege, but I try to be the best ally I can in these areas.
~ Intersectional feminist
~ Agnostic
~ Pro Choice 
~ American 
~ Leo (July 28th)
~ Nicknames: Kiryn, K, Ash
~ A reader, and a total bookworm.
~ Writer (mostly of fanfiction at the present, but hopefully also of original works in the future.)
~ Theatre geek 
~ Harry Potter nerd (Hufflepuff primary, Ravenclaw secondary)
~ A massive (multi)shipper, but not ever a fan of wars or bashing. 
~ Unfortunately, I am both a perfectionist and a procrastinator, and so between that and managing my various disabilities/problems, I am not always good at answering messages or updating quickly. Bear with me. 
~ Avid collector of pins and tsum tsums
~ Trivia junkie
~ Animal enthusiast 
~~~~Currently ~~~~
~~~Watching: Pokemon SM / MCU
~~~Reading: Crown of Feathers
~~~Playing: Pokemon Silver / Super Smash Bros Ultimate / Kingdom Hearts III

summary: “I ASK YOU BECAUSE I TRUST YOU.”  OMFGGGGGGGGGGG WELL, THAT HIT ME RIGHT IN THE FUCKING HEART ALSO, WHAT HAVE I BEEN SAYING ALL...
body:
“I ASK YOU BECAUSE I TRUST YOU.”

OMFGGGGGGGGGGG

WELL, THAT HIT ME RIGHT IN THE FUCKING HEART

ALSO, WHAT HAVE I BEEN SAYING ALL EPISODE????????

i love this, because they actually showed us, all through this episode, that gladion trusts ash, and so him now saying it straight out like this, it feels earned, and not forced or contrived. 

man, this ship is probably gonna skyrocket into at least the top 3 ash ships for me XD

(how it ultimately stacks up against diode and pallet, the current top 2….i guess only time will tell. but i’m already pretty sure it’s gonna knock coma down from its current #3 spot XD)

summary: God... I love Pokeani!Hapu’u lol. She makes me smile, laugh, I truly enjoy this version of her! Kiiinda reminds me of Gomamon...
body:
God… I love Pokeani!Hapu’u lol. She makes me smile, laugh, I truly enjoy this version of her! Kiiinda reminds me of Gomamon :333 She had amazing faces this ep too, and I like how she likes Lilie right of the pat! :D Then lets her ride on her Banbadoro. Also, seeing her speak in such olderly manner is so intriquing. I love it.

But let’s see… I have a feeling SM108 will involve Satoshi, Hapu’u, Kaki, Gladio and possibly Lilie. This is based on how Hapu’u is pretty much gonna be in every episode during Poni Arc, Gladio wanting to battle and meet Kapu-Rehire as well, and SM107 confirmed to have Kaki and Satoshi, with the two angering our Kapu lol. SM109 could be the grand trial battle between Satoshi and Hapu’u, maybe? I have a feeling Lilie might pop in during Sm108 as well but not sure how. Alongside Gladio? Idk.

But man. Two episodes in on Poni Arc and I’m already loving it. The preview for Sm106 looks amazing every single time I watch it, and just… oh man the animation!

I love that bit too much. Look how smooth it is! Kuwagannon/Vikavolt evolution sequence as well! It’s so smooth I can’t get the gif of it to be under 3mb without cutting it in ways I just scream at lol. But just… man. We’re in for a beautiful episode next week, I’m way too excited!

blog.name: superspaghettiwolf
blog.title: Devour your demons
blog.description: Super | 16 | She/they | ♍ | Artist | Mod/art blog | I like to draw and stuff

tags: also sorry for answering this one a little late!
question: 27, 41, Lupus Draco.
answer:
27 | What kind of childhood did your character have?

Lupus’s childhood wasn’t all that bad, in fact he’d probably say it was quite nice. It was just him and his family living out in the woods, no one else there to bother them. However, not every moment out in those woods was as pleasant as it may seem; the scar on his side lives to remind him of that.

Draco loved his childhood! His family lived, and still lives, in a massive castle left abandoned by the humans. With many relics and hoards of treasure, its a perfect place for exploring! He loved playing with his siblings, and hearing stories from his parents about their past.

41 | What does your character do when they’re angry? Why?

When angered, Lupus tends to isolate himself from others, fearful that he may lash out at someone. He succumbs easily to anger, especially when in his mega evolution form. He get’s that anger from his mother’s side of the family, for their lifestyle has always been centered around wrath and brutality.

Draco would try and find someone to talk about whatever it is that’s upsetting him, and to try and find a way to solve the problem. He knows that talking to someone about it will immediately make him feel a ton better than before. Not only that, but he’s aware of how unhealthy it is to bottle things up, which is why he tries avoiding such. If there’s no one he can talk things out with, however, then he’d probably try and keep his mind off of it by doing or thinking about something that makes him happy.

blog.name: pokebiologist
blog.title: Pokémon Biology
blog.description: I'm Theodora, but you can call me Thea! I'm a Battle Girl turned Pokémon Researcher, and I'm excited to share my observations with you. Feel free to ask, submit, request, and share your own findings!

summary: do you have any tips for care of the cyndaquil line? also, do you think they would adapt well to really cold regions? i wanna...
question: do you have any tips for care of the cyndaquil line? also, do you think they would adapt well to really cold regions? i wanna give the best to my babies.
answer:
Cyndaquil and Quilava spend a lot of their time digging around in undergrowth for their food. While Cyndaquil are almost exclusively insectivores and Quilava branch out more in their diet, complex puzzle feeders are a great way to keep them occupied and happy while finding their food. It also prevents them from overstuffing with one large meal, which can be deleterious to their stomach linings over time.

The whole family dust bathes, so you need to provide adequate uncontaminated fine soil in an area that you don’t mind getting dirty. 

As for cold weather, Typhlosion are the most well adapted, as their habitat range includes windy mountainous terrains. It is not advised to expose a Cyndaquil to freezing conditions for extended periods of time, especially if there is snow or water present. You’ll notice that your Pokémon will sleep for longer amounts of time during the winter; this is perfectly normal of the entire line and does not indicate any illness or discomfort.

-Thea

summary: I found an abandoned Houndoom in real rough shape. I'm trying to get him back to health. Any suggestions?
question: I found an abandoned Houndoom in real rough shape. I'm trying to get him back to health. Any suggestions?
answer:
Well, first I would suggest being very careful. Like any scared or hurt Pokémon, that Houndoom is more likely to lash out, which could have serious consequences for you. 

As for taking care of the Pokémon, the first step is to make sure it is not in an environment where it could further hurt itself, and then to provide safe drinking water. If you have a canid-Pokémon grade thermometer and it is safe to get the Houndoom to bite down on it, checking for abnormal body temperatures is the best way to see if you ought to seek professional medical help. Keep in mind, a healthy Houndoom body temperature is between 65 and 68 degrees Celsius.

Overall, do not let any bodily fluids (saliva, blood, etc.) from the Houndoom come into contact with your skin, eyes, or mouth. Contacting a Pokémon Center for help is the best way to ensure a full recovery.

-Thea

~ About Asiryn ~
~ 27
~ I'm a cis woman, so you can use she/her pronouns when referring to me.
~ I'm aroace (sex-repulsed)
~ Physically disabled, suffer from constant, chronic pain and depression, and possibly un-diagnosed anxiety. 
~ I have white and cis privilege, but I try to be the best ally I can in these areas.
~ Intersectional feminist
~ Agnostic
~ Pro Choice 
~ American 
~ Leo (July 28th)
~ Nicknames: Kiryn, K, Ash
~ A reader, and a total bookworm.
~ Writer (mostly of fanfiction at the present, but hopefully also of original works in the future.)
~ Theatre geek 
~ Harry Potter nerd (Hufflepuff primary, Ravenclaw secondary)
~ A massive (multi)shipper, but not ever a fan of wars or bashing. 
~ Unfortunately, I am both a perfectionist and a procrastinator, and so between that and managing my various disabilities/problems, I am not always good at answering messages or updating quickly. Bear with me. 
~ Avid collector of pins and tsum tsums
~ Trivia junkie
~ Animal enthusiast 
~~~~Currently ~~~~
~~~Watching: Pokemon SM / MCU
~~~Reading: Crown of Feathers
~~~Playing: Pokemon Silver / Super Smash Bros Ultimate / Kingdom Hearts III

summary: oh my fucking god, show, quit fucking wasting time with this rotom dex gag nonsense, and get back to all the ash/gladion...

blog.name: swainathan
blog.title: Hiker Daniel
blog.description: Commissions: OPEN.  I draw Pokemon and plants.  Sinnoh fan for life.  Drawings that I upload are by me, most of them being pokemon related

summary: A little something that I was working on recently, trying out a different medium and style.  The original was done with ink on...
caption:
A little something that I was working on recently, trying out a different medium and style.  The original was done with ink on Bristol board, and then I colored it in Photoshop.  Gotta say, working with ink is really fun!  Maybe I’ll actually do Inktober this year…

Like my art?  You can pick this up as a print over at my Inprnt!

Commissions | Redbubble | Teepublic | Twitter | Instagram | INPRNT

title: Golem - 76
body:
Its body, which weighs over 660 pounds, is as hard as stone. It grows bigger by shedding its skin once a year.

- Pokemon Stadium
